WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
I have a VS.Net 2008 IDE with .Net 3.5 framework and a WPF windows Application being developed in Visual Basic . I have addons such as EnterPrise Library 4.0 and WPF toolkit March 2009 version installed.
 
I am creating a user control, one of the properties of which is SelectedId. It is long type. 
 
When I declare the property as follows 
 
    Public Shared ReadOnly SelectedIdProperty As DependencyProperty = _
        DependencyProperty.Register("SelectedId", GetType(Long), GetType(MyUserControl), New PropertyMetadata(0))
 
it errors out as "Default value type does not match type of property 'SelectedId'."
 
But when I change the default value to Long.MinValue, 
 
    Public Shared ReadOnly SelectedIdProperty As DependencyProperty = _
        DependencyProperty.Register("SelectedId", GetType(Long), GetType(MyUserControl), New PropertyMetadata(Long.MinValue))
 
it works!
WorkItem.Summary: Zero As Default Value For Long type Dependency Property Errors Out.

Comments.Message:
Your code should read:
Public Shared ReadOnly SelectedIdProperty As DependencyProperty = _
DependencyProperty.Register("SelectedId", GetType(Long), GetType(MyUserControl), New PropertyMetadata(0L))
(note the L)
Otherwise, you are specifying an integer default value for a long property type.
